languages.text: "Лорд-капитан?" {n}Кассия вздергивает подбородок. Ее поза и взгляд полнятся сдержанностью и благородством нобилите, однако у нее предательски дрожит голос.{/n} "Палубы корабля заполонили вихри грязных красок — кто-то разносит нелепые сплетни о том, что вы собираете чужие сердца подобно победным трофеям. И ваша... коллекция... насчитывает больше одного экземпляра. Прошу вас, развейте мои сомнения — неужели наши чувства друг к другу ничего не стоили?"

"Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia raises her chin. Her posture and gaze are reserved and dignified as is becoming of nobility, yet her trembling voice betrays her emotional state.{/n} "The decks of this voidship abound with swirls of dirty colours — some of your crew are spreading ludicrous gossip about you allegedly collecting people's hearts like victory trophies. And that your... collection... boasts more than one exhibit. Please, dispel my doubts — or do our feelings for each other count for nothing?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан?" {n}Кассия вздергивает подбородок. Ее поза и взгляд полнятся сдержанностью и благородством нобилите, однако у нее предательски дрожит голос.{/n} "Палубы корабля заполонили вихри грязных красок — кто-то разносит нелепые сплетни о том, что вы собираете чужие сердца подобно победным трофеям. И ваша... коллекция... насчитывает больше одного экземпляра. Прошу вас, развейте мои сомнения — неужели наши чувства друг к другу ничего не стоили?"

And that your... collection... boasts more than one exhibit. Please, dispel my doubts — or do our feelings for each other count for nothing?"

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン？」{n}カシアは顎を上げた。彼女の姿勢と眼差しは控えめだけれど威厳があり、貴族らしさを見せているが、震える声が彼女の心情を漏らしていた。{/n}「このヴォイドシップの甲板では汚らわしい色が渦巻いています。{name}様の乗組員の一部が馬鹿げたゴシップを流布しています。{name}様が人々の心を戦利品のように集めているのだとか。そして…その…コレクションには複数が展示されていると。お願いです。あたくしの疑念を打ち消してください。それとも…あたくしたちのお互いへの想いは、何の価値もないのでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia raises her chin. Her posture and gaze are reserved and dignified as is becoming of nobility, yet her trembling voice betrays her emotional state.{/n} "The decks of this voidship abound with swirls of dirty colours — some of your crew are spreading ludicrous gossip about you allegedly collecting people's hearts like victory trophies. And that your... collection... boasts more than one exhibit. Please, dispel my doubts — or do our feelings for each other count for nothing?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン？」{n}カシアは顎を上げた。彼女の姿勢と眼差しは控えめだけれど威厳があり、貴族らしさを見せているが、震える声が彼女の心情を漏らしていた。{/n}「このヴォイドシップの甲板では汚らわしい色が渦巻いています。{name}様の乗組員の一部が馬鹿げたゴシップを流布しています。{name}様が人々の心を戦利品のように集めているのだとか。そして…その…コレクションには複数が展示されていると。お願いです。あたくしの疑念を打ち消してください。それとも…あたくしたちのお互いへの想いは、何の価値もないのでしょうか？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人？”{n}卡西娅抬起下巴，她的姿态与目光充满了矜持和威严，散发着高贵的气场，但她颤抖的声音却暴露了她的情绪状态。{/n}“这艘虚空舰到处都充斥着肮脏的颜色。你的一部分船员正在散布可笑的流言，说你像收集战利品一样收集别人的真心，还说你的……收藏品……不止一件。请你打消我的疑虑吧，还是说，我们对彼此的感情毫无意义？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia raises her chin. Her posture and gaze are reserved and dignified as is becoming of nobility, yet her trembling voice betrays her emotional state.{/n} "The decks of this voidship abound with swirls of dirty colours — some of your crew are spreading ludicrous gossip about you allegedly collecting people's hearts like victory trophies. And that your... collection... boasts more than one exhibit. Please, dispel my doubts — or do our feelings for each other count for nothing?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人？”{n}卡西娅抬起下巴，她的姿态与目光充满了矜持和威严，散发着高贵的气场，但她颤抖的声音却暴露了她的情绪状态。{/n}“这艘虚空舰到处都充斥着肮脏的颜色。你的一部分船员正在散布可笑的流言，说你像收集战利品一样收集别人的真心，还说你的……收藏品……不止一件。请你打消我的疑虑吧，还是说，我们对彼此的感情毫无意义？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? » {n}Cassia relève le menton. Si elle affecte une posture et un regard réservés et dignes de ses nobles origines, les trémolos dans sa voix témoignent de son trouble émotionnel.{/n} « Les ponts de ce vaisseau résonnent de bruits aux couleurs atroces. Certains membres de votre équipage propagent des rumeurs absurdes selon lesquelles vous collectionneriez les cœurs comme autant de trophées de guerre. À les en croire, votre... tableau de chasse comprendrait plus d'une victime. De grâce, dissipez mes doutes... ou avouez franchement que les sentiments qui nous unissent n'ont aucune importance à vos yeux. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia raises her chin. Her posture and gaze are reserved and dignified as is becoming of nobility, yet her trembling voice betrays her emotional state.{/n} "The decks of this voidship abound with swirls of dirty colours — some of your crew are spreading ludicrous gossip about you allegedly collecting people's hearts like victory trophies. And that your... collection... boasts more than one exhibit. Please, dispel my doubts — or do our feelings for each other count for nothing?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? » {n}Cassia relève le menton. Si elle affecte une posture et un regard réservés et dignes de ses nobles origines, les trémolos dans sa voix témoignent de son trouble émotionnel.{/n} « Les ponts de ce vaisseau résonnent de bruits aux couleurs atroces. Certains membres de votre équipage propagent des rumeurs absurdes selon lesquelles vous collectionneriez les cœurs comme autant de trophées de guerre. À les en croire, votre... tableau de chasse comprendrait plus d'une victime. De grâce, dissipez mes doutes... ou avouez franchement que les sentiments qui nous unissent n'ont aucune importance à vos yeux. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Lord Capitán?». {n}Cassia levanta la barbilla. Su postura y mirada son reservadas y dignas como corresponde a la nobleza, pero su voz temblorosa delata su estado emocional.{/n} «Las cubiertas de la nave del vacío están repletas de remolinos de colores sucios. Algunos de sus tripulantes propagan rumores absurdos según los cuales colecciona corazones como trofeos, y su... colección... contaría con más de un ejemplar. Por favor, disipe mis dudas... ¿o es que nuestros sentimientos mutuos son vanos?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia raises her chin. Her posture and gaze are reserved and dignified as is becoming of nobility, yet her trembling voice betrays her emotional state.{/n} "The decks of this voidship abound with swirls of dirty colours — some of your crew are spreading ludicrous gossip about you allegedly collecting people's hearts like victory trophies. And that your... collection... boasts more than one exhibit. Please, dispel my doubts — or do our feelings for each other count for nothing?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Lord Capitán?». {n}Cassia levanta la barbilla. Su postura y mirada son reservadas y dignas como corresponde a la nobleza, pero su voz temblorosa delata su estado emocional.{/n} «Las cubiertas de la nave del vacío están repletas de remolinos de colores sucios. Algunos de sus tripulantes propagan rumores absurdos según los cuales colecciona corazones como trofeos, y su... colección... contaría con más de un ejemplar. Por favor, disipe mis dudas... ¿o es que nuestros sentimientos mutuos son vanos?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia hebt ihr Kinn. Ihre Haltung und ihr Blick sind reserviert und würdevoll, wie es dem Adel geziemt, doch ihre zitternde Stimme verrät ihren emotionalen Zustand.{/n} "Die Decks dieses Raumschiffs sind voller Wirbel in schmutzigen Farben – ein Teil Eurer Crew verbreitet lächerliche Gerüchte darüber, dass Ihr angeblich die Herzen anderer sammelt wie Siegestrophäen. Und dass Eure ... Sammlung ... mehr als ein Exponat aufweist. Bitte zerstreut meine Zweifel – oder sind unsere Gefühle füreinander nichts wert?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia raises her chin. Her posture and gaze are reserved and dignified as is becoming of nobility, yet her trembling voice betrays her emotional state.{/n} "The decks of this voidship abound with swirls of dirty colours — some of your crew are spreading ludicrous gossip about you allegedly collecting people's hearts like victory trophies. And that your... collection... boasts more than one exhibit. Please, dispel my doubts — or do our feelings for each other count for nothing?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia hebt ihr Kinn. Ihre Haltung und ihr Blick sind reserviert und würdevoll, wie es dem Adel geziemt, doch ihre zitternde Stimme verrät ihren emotionalen Zustand.{/n} "Die Decks dieses Raumschiffs sind voller Wirbel in schmutzigen Farben – ein Teil Eurer Crew verbreitet lächerliche Gerüchte darüber, dass Ihr angeblich die Herzen anderer sammelt wie Siegestrophäen. Und dass Eure ... Sammlung ... mehr als ein Exponat aufweist. Bitte zerstreut meine Zweifel – oder sind unsere Gefühle füreinander nichts wert?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan?" {n}Cassia çenesini kaldırıyor. Duruşu ve bakışları, bir soyluya yaraşırcasına vakur ve haysiyetli görünürken titreyen sesi ise duygu durumunu ele veriyor.{/n} "Uçsuz gemisi güverteleri, kirli renklerin girdaplarıyla dolup taşıyor. Mürettebatından bazıları, sözüm ona yürekleri çalıp zafer ganimeti misali topladığına dair gülünç dedikodular yayıyor. Senin bu... Koleksiyonun ise... Tek bir sergiden fazlasıyla iftihar ediyor. Lütfen kuşkularımı gider. Yoksa birbirimize karşı duygularımız, hiçbir şey ifade etmiyor mu?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia raises her chin. Her posture and gaze are reserved and dignified as is becoming of nobility, yet her trembling voice betrays her emotional state.{/n} "The decks of this voidship abound with swirls of dirty colours — some of your crew are spreading ludicrous gossip about you allegedly collecting people's hearts like victory trophies. And that your... collection... boasts more than one exhibit. Please, dispel my doubts — or do our feelings for each other count for nothing?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan?" {n}Cassia, çenesini kaldırıyor. Duruşu ve bakışları, bir soyluya yaraşırcasına vakur ve haysiyetli görünse de titreyen sesi, duygu durumunu ele veriyor.{/n} "Uçsuz gemisi güverteleri, kirli renklerin girdaplarıyla dolup taşıyor. Mürettebatından bazıları, sözüm ona yürekleri çalıp zafer ganimeti misali topladığına dair gülünç dedikodular yayıyor. Senin bu... Koleksiyonun ise... Tek bir sergiden fazlasıyla iftihar ediyor. Lütfen kuşkularımı gider. Yoksa birbirimize karşı duygularımız, hiçbir şey ifade etmiyor mu?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
